Method.name: getFormsList
Method.Implementation: set forms = [] $$$forAll(form, $$$formGlobal) set formObj = {"name":$$$formGlobal(form), "class": form} do forms.$push(formObj) $$$endFor quit forms

Method.name: formExists
Method.Description: Check that form with this classname exist

Method.name: formExistsStatus
Method.Description: Check that form with this classname exist
